name: LAST_VALUE
shortDescription: Get the last value in a group or window
description: Window function that returns the last value in an ordered partition.

parameters.name: column
parameters.description: Column to get last value from

examples.title: Last value per group
examples.description: Get most recent value in each partition
examples.sql:
SELECT product, amount,
  LAST_VALUE(amount) OVER (PARTITION BY product ORDER BY timestamp) as last_amount
FROM sales

notes: Window frame affects which row is considered 'last'
Default frame may not include all rows - use ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING for full partition
